hero.shortSummary: Designing things and solving problems are two of my greatest passions. I've spent over a year working with famous technologies. I've been concentrating my efforts lately on learning and developing my problem solving skills

aboutMe.summary: Hello! My name is Deepak and I enjoy working with Data and create interesting things with it, I also love designing stuff. Designing things and solving problems are two of my greatest passions. I'm currently focused on developing my problem solving skills and learning about new technologies, such as cloud computing.

experiences.summary: As a Software Engineer Trainee at Whirlpool Corporation, I developed a GenAI Proof of Concept (PoC) designed to boost code quality, security, and logic, while streamlining developer workflows. Contributed to implementing CI/CD pipelines for enhanced deployment efficiency and automation. Collaborated closely with teams to refine DevOps processes and tools continuously.

Developed a dynamic blog website featuring an integrated editor, empowering users to effortlessly publish their content. Collaborating seamlessly with team members, I contribute to project development and event management. Versatility is a key aspect of my role, as I work across a spectrum of technologies to bring diverse projects to fruition.

projects.name: AI Buddy
projects.summary: This project helps users improve their communication skills through practice with a machine learning model and access to study material. The goal is to help users become more confident and effective communicators in various situations.

projects.name: Speaker Identification System
projects.summary: This application aims to reduce the time required for manual attendance and prevent fake attendance. It allows teachers to schedule attendance using students' voices and download and update attendance records.

projects.name: Shopify Scrapper
projects.summary: The purpose of this scraper is to extract data from Shopify stores and save it to a database. It has the ability to scrape multiple stores simultaneously, making it a versatile and efficient tool.

projects.name: Dominant Color
projects.summary: The purpose of this module is to fetch the dominent color from the image given as input. It takes the image as input and return the hue of dominent color.

projects.name: Optical Character Recognition
projects.summary: This OCR module is able to extract text from images and PDF files. It takes an image or PDF file as input and returns the text that it has extracted from the file as output.

projects.name: Speech Emotion Classifier
projects.summary: The purpose behind this project is to build a model which can classify human emotion in different categories from an Audio file.

projects.name: CryptDiary
projects.summary: This project allows users to store and managing their personal detail like Card Details, Addresses, Login Details of other platforms, Take Note, and TODO list.

projects.name: DevSecOps - Jenkins
projects.summary: This is a Jenkins and Docker Setup which allow you run each job in an isolated Docker Container which takes the CI/CD Workflow to next level. This also gives you an option to operate jobs using traditional method.

projects.name: GenAI Pull Request Reviewer
projects.summary: This is Cody a self-hosted pull request reviewer that analyze your code and suggest Improvement. It helps you maintain high code quality and improve you development workflow.
